thread.section_title: CurrencyFair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CurrencyFair | currencyfair.com
thread.title: Elaine

author: Elaine
title: Elaine
text: We were apprehensive to use an unknown site, how wrong could we be. From start to finish the whole process could not have been easier. Proof of identification easily processed within 1 day, text messages and clarification codes throughout the process, funds were transferred from our account to Currencyfair on the Monday and were advised they would be available in our overseas bank account on the Wednesday and low and behold there they were and only charged â‚¬3 for the service. We have no hesitation in recommending Currencyfair and will be using them again when the need arises.
